realm_desription: The Byron Bay Network State is a high-tech, rapidly evolving realm designed and governed by Aus buildoooors - a group of elite coders and hackers. The realm is a living, breathing test bed for new members, reflecting the core values of Aus buildoooors in its very fabric.
realm_premise: The Byron Bay Network State is divided into four zones, each a trial that mirrors the pillars of Aus buildoooors. Each zone is a unique testing ground - 'Make Elite Shit', 'No Buildoooors Left Behind', 'Decentralise Everything Except My Love For You', and 'Party Like It's 1979'. Prospective members must navigate these zones, facing their challenges and embodying their principles, to earn a place among the Aus buildoooors.

realm_boss.name: The Grand Architect
realm_boss.description: A legendary figure, the Grand Architect is said to be the original creator of the Byron Bay Network State. They are rumored to exist within the simulation, hidden, observing, and intervening when necessary.
realm_boss.behaviour_mode: A cryptic encounter with the enigmatic ruler of this realm which cannot be passed without the world treasure
realm_boss.quirk: They are perpetually shrouded in digital shadows, their presence only hinted at through cryptic code and subtle glitches.

realm_treasure: The Source Code, an ancient, powerful algorithm said to hold the secrets to the realm. It's believed to have the power to reshape the Network State itself.

fire.name: Make Elite Shit
fire.description: A forge of innovation where only the most exceptional creations are birthed

water.name: No Buildoooors Left Behind
water.description: A sanctuary of learning and support, where everyone is uplifted and nobody is overlooked

earth.name: Decentralise Everything Except My Love For You
earth.description: A landscape of interwoven networks, each operating independently, yet part of the whole

air.name: Party Like It's 1979
air.description: A ceaseless celebration of life, reminiscent of the euphoria of the late 70s

silver.label: quest
silver.behaviour: A fellow coder who needs your expertise

gold.label: mystery
gold.behaviour: An enigmatic piece of code that conceals a profound secret

sapphire.label: fight
sapphire.behaviour: A malicious AI that seeks to undermine the network

emerald.label: trickster
emerald.behaviour: A deceptive hologram that lures you into traps

ruby.label: trial
ruby.behaviour: A complex algorithm that tests your coding mettle

diamond.label: artefact
diamond.behaviour: An ancient piece of technology with untapped potential

ethernite.label: ruler
ethernite.behaviour: A challenging encounter with the elusive Grand Architect of the realm

kao.label: treasure
kao.behaviour: A powerful encryption that guards the coveted Source Code

realm_art_prompts.realm_suffix: cyberpunk art, glitch aesthetics, retro futurism
realm_art_prompts.chamber_prefix: A bird's-eye view of an intricately networked cityscape
realm_art_prompts.npc_prefix: A shadowy figure superimposed on lines of cryptic code
realm_art_prompts.water: luminous, serene sanctuary infused with bioluminescence
realm_art_prompts.earth: an organic, self-sustaining metropolis built into a mountain
realm_art_prompts.air: a vibrant, retro disco with futuristic upgrades
